XEmacLite Struct Reference

#include <xemaclite.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XEmacLite driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every EmacLite device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • xemaclite.h
